comments:
Hi

While debugging a program that I've been working on for months, I made some
changes, and now get a popup message, 'Error Parsing Debugger Variables',
whenever  I reach a section in the code that has run successfully for months.  I
added some more modules to my Perl tree this afternoon; this may be the problem.
 But this felt like an Eclipse bug to me, hence this report.

Thanks!
tl

Hi

According to the Eclipse System Summary, I have:
org.eclipse.debug.core (3.0.1) "Debug Core"
org.eclipse.debug.ui (3.0.1) "Debug UI"
org.eclipse.jdt.debug (3.0.1) "JDI Debug Model"
org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui (3.0.1) "JDI Debug UI"
org.epic.debug (0.3.0) "Debug Plug-in"

Here's an excerpt from the log file:

tl

This is a bug in the Perl debugger plugin you've installed (org.epic.debug). You
should file a bug report against that project.

http://e-p-i-c.sourceforge.net/main.html

Thanks for the fast service.  I just filed
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1114657&group_id=75859&atid=545274.

Thanks again
tl
